description:
Frame mount, seat bag, or jersey pocket, this little high pressure pump doesn’t mind how you carry it, it just wants to come along for the ride. A clever overlapping handle design allows the Pressure Drive deliver up to 120psi, making it great for your gravel grinds and road rips.

  • Overlapping design contains a flexible hose for easy pumping
  • Reversible hose threads onto Presta or Schrader valves and has an integrated valve core tool
  • Machined aluminum design keeps weight low and strength high
  • Pumps up to 120psi
  • Bottle cage frame mount included
name: Lezyne Pressure Drive HP Pump
